synopsis.text:
Anime Synopsis:

In an unforeseen turn of events, the group 'nonet' finds themselves collaborating with the 'Ootori' members from the prestigious Ootori Song Academy to stage a unique theatrical production. The chosen play is a captivating rendition of the classic Cinderella tale, with a creative twist. Momoko Asahina steps into the iconic role of Cinderella, while Miyabi Kunishiro portrays the charming prince. Adding a layer of intrigue, Kokomi Shiina takes on an unexpected role in the production, sparking curiosity among the audience. This exciting collaboration promises a fresh take on the beloved fairy tale, weaving together the talents of the nonet and Ootori members.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
